verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תַעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su Ye shall make לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem אֱלִילִ֗ם <S%H457><s%> 'e-li-Lim, you no idols וּפֶ֤סֶל <S%H6459><s%> u-Fe-sel nor graven image וּמַצֵּבָה֙ <S%H4676><s%> u-matz-tze-Vah a standing image לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תָקִ֣ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> ta-Ki-mu neither rear you up לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> ve-'E-ven of stone מַשְׂכִּ֗ית <S%H4906><s%> mas-Kit, [any] image לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu neither shall ye set up בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-tze-Chem, in your land לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <S%H7812><s%> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot to bow down עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha; and כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto it for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שַׁבְּתֹתַ֣י <S%H7676><s%> shab-be-to-Tai my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mo-ru, Ye shall keep וּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> u-mik-da-Shi my sanctuary תִּירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra-'u; and reverence אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If בְּחֻקֹּתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> te-Le-chu; walk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִצְוֹתַ֣י <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tai my commandments תִּשְׁמְר֔וּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Ru, and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem and do אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti Then I will give גִשְׁמֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1653><s%> gish-mei-Chem you rain בְּעִתָּ֑ם <S%H6256><s%> be-'it-Tam; in due season וְנָתְנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-nat-Nah shall yield הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz and the land יְבוּלָ֔הּ <S%H2981><s%> ye-vu-Lah, her increase וְעֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> ve-'Etz and the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten shall yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H6529><s%> pir-Yo. their fruit

וְהִשִּׂ֨יג <S%H5381><s%> ve-his-Sig shall reach לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem דַּ֙יִשׁ֙ <S%H1786><s%> da-yish And your threshing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בָּצִ֔יר <S%H1210><s%> ba-Tzir, unto the vintage וּבָצִ֖יר <S%H1210><s%> u-va-Tzir and the vintage יַשִּׂ֣יג <S%H5381><s%> yas-Sig shall reach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> Za-ra'; unto the sowing time וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> va-'a-chal-Tem and ye shall eat לַחְמְכֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> lach-me-Chem your bread לָשֹׂ֔בַע <S%H7648><s%> la-Soa', to the full וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3427><s%> vi-shav-Tem and dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach safely בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-tze-Chem. in your land

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will give שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> sha-lOm peace בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land וּשְׁכַבְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7901><s%> u-she-chav-Tem and ye shall lie down וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein no מַחֲרִ֑יד <S%H2729><s%> ma-cha-Rid; and none shall make [you] afraid וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֞י <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Ti and I will rid חַיָּ֤ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah beasts רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah evil מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, out of the land וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev neither shall the sword לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and no תַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> ta-'a-Vor go בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-tze-Chem. through your land

וּרְדַפְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7291><s%> u-re-daf-Tem And ye shall chase אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Chem; your enemies וְנָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-fe-Lu and they shall fall לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem before לֶחָֽרֶב <S%H2719><s%> le-Cha-rev you by the sword

וְרָדְפוּ֨ <S%H7291><s%> ve-rad-Fu of you shall chase מִכֶּ֤ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem at חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah And five מֵאָ֔ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah, an hundred וּמֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'Ah and an hundred מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem at רְבָבָ֣ה <S%H7233><s%> re-va-Vah of you shall put ten thousand יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <S%H7291><s%> yir-Do-fu; to flight וְנָפְל֧וּ <S%H5307><s%> ve-naf-Lu shall fall אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Chem and your enemies לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem before לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> le-Cha-rev. you by the sword

וּפָנִ֣יתִי <S%H6437><s%> u-fa-Ni-ti For I will have respect אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, toward וְהִפְרֵיתִ֣י <S%H6509><s%> ve-hif-rei-Ti unto you and make you fruitful אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֖י <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-bei-Ti and multiply אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti you and establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem. for

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H398><s%> va-'a-chal-Tem And ye shall eat יָשָׁ֖ן <S%H3465><s%> ya-Shan the old נוֹשָׁ֑ן <S%H3462><s%> no-Shan; old store וְיָשָׁ֕ן <S%H3462><s%> ve-ya-Shan supply מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because חָדָ֖שׁ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash of the new תּוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> to-Tzi-'u. and bring forth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set מִשְׁכָּנִ֖י <S%H4908><s%> mish-ka-Ni my tabernacle בְּתוֹכְכֶ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> be-toch-Chem; among וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- will not תִגְעַ֥ל <S%H1602><s%> tig-'Al shall not abhor נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi you and my soul אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

וְהִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֙ <S%H1980><s%> ve-hit-hal-lach-Ti And I will walk בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch-Chem, among וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ti you and will be לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him; your God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem and ye תִּהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> tih-yu- and ye shall be לִ֥י li לְעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am. my people

וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im- If עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- And if ye will not yet אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh, these לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> tish-me-'U for all this hearken לִ֑י Li; וְיָסַפְתִּי֙ <S%H3254><s%> ve-ya-saf-Ti more לְיַסְּרָ֣ה <S%H3256><s%> le-yas-se-Rah unto me then I will punish אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' you seven times עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> chat-to-tei-Chem. for your sins

וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֖י <S%H7665><s%> ve-sha-var-Ti And I will break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on the pride עֻזְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-Chem; of your power וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמֵיכֶם֙ <S%H8064><s%> she-mei-Chem your heaven כַּבַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> kab-bar-Zel, as iron וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַרְצְכֶ֖ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Chem and your earth כַּנְּחֻשָֽׁה׃ <S%H5154><s%> kan-ne-chu-Shah. as brass
